entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
